vulnerabilities.title: Injection in bodymen
vulnerabilities.description: bodymen before 1.1.1 is vulnerable to Prototype Pollution. The handler function could be tricked into adding or modifying properties of Object.prototype using a __proto__ payload.

vulnerabilities.title: Prototype Pollution in bodymen
vulnerabilities.description: The package bodymen from 0.0.0 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution via the handler function which could be tricked into adding or modifying properties of Object.prototype using a __proto__ payload. **Note:** This vulnerability derives from an incomplete fix to [CVE-2019-10792](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-BODYMEN-548897)
